name: My Forgotten Home In Tanodim
description:
This is part 1 of my RPG.  In this part the main character, after a strange dream, ends up in another dimension and finds out that there are creatures she's never seen before, some of which aren't the friendliest.  She's also not sure where she is, and thinks she could be dreaming. 

There is a cut-scene at the beginning of the game and an intentional glitch.  Also, the controls are WASD or the arrow keys to move.
